Counter-Strike is by now the greatest multiplayer first-person shooter of all time, and the best Counter-Strike players in the world are the best first-person shooter players in the world. It is simple enough for beginners, yet deep enough that many regular players have a decade of expertise. It rewards strategy, communication, and mechanical skill from casual pick-up-games to worldwide competitive tournaments. What began as a Half-Life mod stood on its own as the legendary version 1.6, grew as Source, and became a dominant international pastime with Global Offensive. 

I enthusiastically recommend this game.
